function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Interconnectedness of all things leading to spread of contagious diseases","Impact":"Severe impact of pandemic and future contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Reevaluate status quo for biodiversity conservation, enhance local leadership of research projects, promote resilient behaviors","Technologies":"Digital monitoring systems, data analysis tools for disease tracking","People":"Global population, vulnerable communities, conservation professionals","Owner":"Governments, conservation organizations, research institutions, local communities"}]}
